title: Utility Bill Extraction Schema
description: Schema for extracting key fields from diverse utility bills.

provider.title: Utility Name
provider.description: The name of the utility providing the service and issuing the bill.

phone_number.title: Customer Service Phone Number
phone_number.description: The customer service phone number for the utility formatted XXX-XXX-XXXX.

website.title: Website
website.description: Official website for account management and payments.

usage_bar_chart.description: Does the utility bill include a chart depicting usage trends over time?

account_holder.title: Account Holder Name
account_holder.description: Full name of the account holder. This may be a person or organization.

account_number.title: Account Number
account_number.description: Unique identifier for the customer account.

service_address.title: Service Address
service_address.description: The address for the property where utility service is provided. This may or may not be the same as the billing address. Remove new line characters and replace with a space.

service_address_primary.description: The primary street address for the property where utility service is provided including building or house number, predirectionals, street name, postdirectionals, and street suffix. This may or may not be the same as the billing address. Remove new line characters and replace with a space.

service_address_city.description: The city for the address where utility service is provided.

service_address_state.description: The 2 letter state abbreviation for the address where utility service is provided.

service_address_zip.description: The 5-digit Zip Code for the address where utility service is provided.

billing_summary.title: Billing Summary

due_date.title: Due Date
due_date.description: Date by which payment is due, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

bill_date.title: Bill Date
bill_date.description: Date the bill was issued, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

service_start_date.description: The starting date for the period of service covered by the utility bill.

service_end_date.description: The ending date for the period of service covered by the utility bill.

total_amount_due.title: Total Amount Due
total_amount_due.description: Total amount due for the current bill, including currency symbol.

billing_summary.description: Summary of charges and due dates.

electric_charges.title: Electric Charges

meter_number.title: Electric Meter Number
meter_number.description: Identifier for the electric meter. Blank if this bill does not inlcude electric service.

usage_kwh.title: Electric Usage (kWh)
usage_kwh.description: Total electric used in kilowatt-hours for the billing period. Zero if this bill does not inlcude electric service.

total_electric_charges.title: Total Electric Charges
total_electric_charges.description: Total electric charges for the billing period, including currency symbol. Zero if this bill does not inlcude electric service.

electric_charges.description: Details of electric usage and charges for the billing period.

gas_charges.title: Gas Charges

meter_number.title: Gas Meter Number
meter_number.description: Identifier for the gas meter. Blank if this bill does not inlcude gas service.

usage_therms.title: Gas Usage (Therms)
usage_therms.description: Total gas used in therms for the billing period. Zero if this bill does not inlcude gas service.

total_gas_charges.title: Total Gas Charges
total_gas_charges.description: Total gas charges for the billing period, including currency symbol. Zero if this bill does not inlcude gas service.

gas_charges.description: Details of gas usage and charges for the billing period.
